column4: anyone have time to help me with an problem?,, just installed ubuntu, on first startup the monitor goes "no supported mode"... -oh crap i think.. then i try "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg"  and take away all settings that the monitor not supports,, choosed medium and carried on,, now the monitor works on the startup but when  x is loaded the screen wents blank :-/..Dear ubuntupeople...
Cant see anythig on screen,, black and dead..:-/
